law.catch_line: Supervision of all fires by Metropolitan Dade County Fire Chief.

text.section:
Sec. 14-5. Supervision of all fires by Metropolitan Dade County Fire Chief.
The setting of all fires, the burning of all trash and brush, and the clearing of all fields, woods, prairie or other lands by fire within the unincorporated areas of the County shall be under the supervision of the Metropolitan Dade County Fire Chief, and in accordance with such rules and regulations as may be prescribed therefor.
